dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT a.* FROM (SELECT DISTINCT s.shipment_xid, dm.first_name || ' ' || dm.last_name AS document_mgr, sref.shipment_refnum_value AS booking_confirmation, loc.country_code3_gid destination_country, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssd3.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd3 WHERE ssd3.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd3.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990') container_count, TO_CHAR((SELECT COUNT(ssd4.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM shipment_stop_d ssd4 WHERE ssd4.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd4.stop_num = 1) - (SELECT COUNT(ssur.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd5 ON ssur.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd5.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssur.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PHYTOSANITARY CERT NUMBER' AND ssd5.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd5.stop_num = 1),'999,999,990') missing_container_count, TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,'SCOULAR.TSCCST'),'MM/DD/YYYY') earliest_load_date, (CASE WHEN loc.country_code3_gid IN ('ARE','BGD') THEN TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,'SCOULAR.TSCCST') + 14,'MM/DD/YYYY') ELSE TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,'SCOULAR.TSCCST') + 27,'MM/DD/YYYY') END) phyto_due_date, (CASE WHEN loc.country_code3_gid IN ('ARE','BGD') THEN TO_CHAR((glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,'SCOULAR.TSCCST') + 14) - (SYSDATE),'999') ELSE TO_CHAR((glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.attribute_date10,'SCOULAR.TSCCST') + 27) - (SYSDATE),'999') END) days_to_phyto_due FROM shipment s INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref ON sref.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'CHARTER VOYAGE' INNER JOIN charter_voyage cv ON cv.charter_voyage_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.' || sref.shipment_refnum_value INNER JOIN location loca ON cv.dest_location_gid = loca.location_gid INNER JOIN location loc ON s.dest_location_gid = loc.location_gid INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON sref2.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.LOC_CODE' INNER JOIN shipment_refnum sref3 ON sref3.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND sref3.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR.COMMODITY' INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON s.shipment_gid = ssej.shipment_gid INNER JOIN s_equipment_s_ship_unit_join sessuj ON ssej.s_equipment_gid = sessuj.s_equipment_gid INNER JOIN s_ship_unit_line ssul ON sessuj.s_ship_unit_gid = ssul.s_ship_unit_gid INNER JOIN ob_order_base oob ON ssul.order_base_gid = oob.order_base_gid AND oob.order_base_gid like 'SCOULAR/BCO.S%' LEFT OUTER JOIN VIEW_SHIPMENT_DOCUMENT_MANAGER dm ON dm.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND ((SELECT COUNT(ssu.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit ssu INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd1 ON ssu.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd1.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd1.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd1.stop_num = 1) > (SELECT COUNT(ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid) FROM s_ship_unit_refnum ssur2 INNER JOIN shipment_stop_d ssd2 ON ssur2.s_ship_unit_gid = ssd2.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssur2.s_ship_unit_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/BCO.PHYTOSANITARY CERT NUMBER' AND ssd2.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ssd2.stop_num = 1)) AND NOT s.attribute_date10 IS NULL AND loca.country_code3_gid != 'USA' AND TRIM(sref2.shipment_refnum_value) != '2200' AND TRIM(sref2.shipment_refnum_value) != '5071' AND TRIM(sref2.shipment_refnum_value) != '5332' AND TRIM(sref2.shipment_refnum_value) != '5333' AND TRIM(sref2.shipment_refnum_value) != '5334' AND TRIM(sref2.shipment_refnum_value) != '5335' AND TRIM(sref3.shipment_refnum_value) != 'BAKE' ) a ORDER BY TO_DATE(a.phyto_due_date,'MM/DD/YYYY') ASC
